column4: Im having a bit of trouble, when i try to allow my proprietary driver to download and run that 8.10 has detedted, it wont allow it
are you using sudo / gksudo to run the app to get the driver?
well, its not that its not being allowed, its just not doing anything
you may need to configure your system to use whats downloaded
no, ubuntu detected it for me and told me which one it recommended, when it trys to download, nil
Theres a nice guide there, or you can try !envyng
ok, ill take a look thank you
is there something i can tyoe to make sure i dont see everyone comming and going from this room?
pidgin has a plugin for it
yeah, im on pidgin, ill have to take a closer look
so by typing lspci | grep VGA it gave me a read out, and told me what i already knew, but was i acully telling the OS to look there for the card?
because after typing the command, the install went fine
then i have no idea, you got the goal which is cool though :)
lol true, thanks for the heads up on the coming/going plugin too
